tool_description: Normalizes interest expenses and financing costs to reflect sustainable capital structure for valuation.

market_interest_rate.description: Current market interest rate for similar debt

error_messages: Invalid debt amount: Total debt must be non-negative.
Unrealistic interest rate: Implied interest rate appears unusually high or low.
Missing market rate: Market interest rate required for normalization when significantly different from current rate.
Inconsistent data: Interest expense should align with debt levels and market conditions.
usage: Provide debt and interest expense information along with optional market rate data. Tool normalizes financing costs for valuation purposes.

implied_interest_rate.description: Current implied interest rate on debt

debt_capacity_assessment.description: Assessment of current debt levels and capacity
